price: 1. Kai veidmainiai ateina pas tave (Muchammedai ﷺ ), jie sako: „Mes liudijame, kad tu esi Allaho Pasiuntinys.“ Ir Allahas žino, kad tu esi Jo Pasiuntinys ir Allahas liudija, kad veidmainiai yra melagiai.
arabic: إِذَا جَآءَكَ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ قَالُواْ نَشۡهَدُ إِنَّكَ لَرَسُولُ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّكَ لَرَسُولُهُۥ وَٱللَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ إِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ لَكَٰذِبُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: idhā jāaka al-munāfiqūna qālū nashhadu innaka larasūlu al-lahi wal-lahu yaʿlamu innaka larasūluhu wal-lahu yashhadu inna al-munāfiqīna lakādhibūna
